sentences.sContent: The onlookers were shouting, cheering, and waving banners.
sentences.sCn: 观众挥动着横幅，又是叫喊又是欢呼。

sentences.sContent: ...a large stretched banner could have said...

phrases.pCn: 美国国歌；美国国旗（等于Stars and Stripes）

remMethod.val: ban(禁止) ＋ n ＋ er → 禁止悬挂横幅 → 横幅

trans.tranOther: a long piece of cloth on which something is written, often carried between two poles
